Description: When I get back from grocery store do I need to wash my groceries and grocery sacks with garden hose outside to prevent Coronavirus ?
DialogueText:
Patient:
When I get back from grocery store do I need to wash my groceries and grocery sacks with garden hose outside to prevent Coronavirus ?
Doctor:
In brief:   Groceries.    https://www.consumerreports.  org/food-shopping/how-to-protect-yourself-from-coronavirus-when-grocery-shopping/This article will help!  Would you like to video or text chat with me?
